title: How to Be Respected in Star Wars Battlefront 2 Assault

steps.headline: Don't glitch.
steps.description: This will make people think you are pathetic, and need to cheat to win (glitching could also get you booted).

steps.headline: Help team mates.
steps.description: If you see someone getting beaten up by an opponent, either use force pull or force push to get the enemy away.

steps.headline: Don't team kill.
steps.description: This will get people mad at you. It can be very annoying knowing there is someone who is after you. This will also earn you a bad reputation.

steps.headline: Give bonuses.
steps.description: If you are a character such as Grievous, Leia, Han Solo, or Chewbacca, use your bonuses on your team mates to give them that extra boost!

steps.headline: Respect other players.
steps.description: If you accidentally push a teammate, kill them, or just injure them, apologize (preferred), or crouch and stand up, thus executing a bowing motion. This will show that you are sorry for what you have done.

steps.headline: Try not to steal a kill (killing enemies with low health that are in the process of being killed).
steps.description: People could get mad at you.

steps.headline: If you can, get up on top of the big ship that's in front of the arena, there is a balcony.
steps.description: Get on it, land, and you can then either snipe people out, or throw your lightsaber at them. It's quite fun.

text: Don't glitch. This will make people think you are pathetic, and need to cheat to win (glitching could also get you booted). Help team mates. If you see someone getting beaten up by an opponent, either use force pull or force push to get the enemy away. Don't team kill. This will get people mad at you. It can be very annoying knowing there is someone who is after you. This will also earn you a bad reputation. Give bonuses. If you are a character such as Grievous, Leia, Han Solo, or Chewbacca, use your bonuses on your team mates to give them that extra boost! Respect other players. If you accidentally push a teammate, kill them, or just injure them, apologize (preferred), or crouch and stand up, thus executing a bowing motion. This will show that you are sorry for what you have done. Try not to steal a kill (killing enemies with low health that are in the process of being killed). People could get mad at you. If you can, get up on top of the big ship that's in front of the arena, there is a balcony. Get on it, land, and you can then either snipe people out, or throw your lightsaber at them. It's quite fun.
